Item.name: 1001 Jokes for Nerds
Item.description: A battered looking book full of puns that only a nerd would find funny

Item.name: coffee
Item.description: A warm, caffeinated beverage that might help you finish your computer science homework on time.

Item.name: muffin
Item.description: A chocolate pastry stuffed with chocolate chips that is distinguishable from a cupcake only in the sense that it does not have frosting on it.
